scavenge.offset.block: Tests at offset X=%1$s, Y=%2$s, Z=%3$s for Block: %4$s
scavenge.offset.block_effect: Places %4$s at offset X=%1$s, Y=%2$s, Z=%3$s
scavenge_player.add_luck.desc: Adds %s Luck to the Loot Pool
scavenge_player.add_potion.desc: Provides Potion Effects with a %s%% chance
scavenge_player.can_harvest.desc: Requires Player to be able to Harvest the Block
scavenge_player.consume_inv_items.desc: Consumes a List of Items from the Player
scavenge_player.damage_item.desc: Damages the Item with a %2$s%% chance
scavenge_player.has_effect.desc: Needs a set of Potion Effects
scavenge_player.has_health.desc: Requires a certain amount of Health
scavenge_player.has_hunger.desc: Requires a certain amount of Food
scavenge_player.has_inv_items.desc: Requires a Set of Items in the player Inventory
scavenge_player.has_item_tag.desc: Requires a Item that is stored in the %s tag
scavenge_player.has_max_health.desc: Requires a certain amount of Max Health
scavenge_player.has_nbt.desc: Requires the player to have specific NBT Data
scavenge_player.has_tag.desc: Requires the Player to have a tag
scavenge_player.has_xp.desc: Requires a certain amount of XP %1$s
scavenge_player.is_burning.desc: Requires the player to be on fire
scavenge_player.is_hand.desc: Requires the %s Hand to be used
scavenge_player.limit_action.desc: Limits your actions to a certain amount
scavenge_player.per_player.desc: Can be only used a limited amount of times per player
scavenge_player.remove_potion.desc: Removes potion effects with a %s%% chance
scavenge_player.set_nbt.desc: Sets NBT data to the player
scavenge_score.has_stat.desc: Requires the %s Stat to be at a unknown amount
scavenge_score.set_score.desc: Modifies the score by a unknown amount
scavenge_score.set_stat.desc: Modifies the %s Stat by a unknown amount
scavenge_tile.add_items.desc: Adds a List of Items to the Block Inventory
scavenge_tile.consume_items.desc: Consumes a List of Item from the Block Inventory
scavenge_tile.has_energy.desc: Requires a Unknown amount of Forge Energy
scavenge_tile.has_items.desc: Requires a list of Items in the Block Inventory
scavenge_tile.modify_energy.desc: Modifies the Forge Energy by a unknown amount
scavenge_utils.add_data.desc: Adds Data to the Script Executor
scavenge_utils.array_condition.desc: A List of conditions that %s need to be fulfilled
scavenge_utils.array_effect.desc: A List of effects that will be applied
scavenge_utils.conditional_effect.desc: A Conditional Effect that may be executed
scavenge_world.consume_block.desc: Replaces the Block with %1$s with a %2$s%% chance. (Drops: %3$s)
scavenge_world.has_entities.desc: Requires a Unknown amount of %1$s within %2$s Blocks
scavenge_world.has_game_time.desc: Requires a Unknown amount of the World Existing
scavenge_world.has_property.desc: Requires the Block to have certain Properties
scavenge_world.has_spawn.desc: Requires the Block to be within the range of spawn.
scavenge_world.is_side.desc: Requires the %s side to be clicked
scavenge_world.local_difficulty.desc: Tests for a Unspecified Local Difficulty
scavenge_world.per_block_effect.desc: Can be only used a unknown amount of time
scavenge_world.per_chunk_effect.desc: Can only be used a unknown amount of time per chunk
